name: Robots Save the Day
description:
Cubot wakes up in his broom closet. Something is wrong. The ship's alarm is sounding. This compartment will be ejected into space in ten seconds!

Enter the commands necessary for Cubot to find his friend Killbot and save their space ship!

Robots Save the Day is a story-driven, turn-based puzzle game with 5 levels. The total play time should be 30 to 60 minutes.
